content: cinderella pumpkin pillow is a crocheted pillow a rectangular piece is crocheted seamed stuffed and a simple stem is added the sections of the pumpkin are achieved by pulling yarn through the bottom and top of the pumpkin tightly each pillow can be made in just a few hours or less enjoy size small 25in 64cm circumference/ 4in 10cm tall medium 34in 86cm circumference/ 6in 15cm tall large 44in 112cm circumference/ 9in 23cm tall stem approximately 3in 8cm long gauge not important have fun find all the supplies here 1 yarn pumpkins bernat blanket mist-ical 10 5oz/300g 220yds/201m 100% polyester samples shown in canyon small rose quartz medium earthenware large small approximately 4oz/120g 85yds/78m medium approximately 7oz/200g 150yds/137m large approximately 10 5oz/300g 220yds/201m stem make one for each pillow loops and threads petite purl 537 yd/8 75 oz 491m/250g approximately 15 yd for each stem crochet hook us size 11 8mm for pumpkin us size 6 4mm for stem notions large darning needle scissors polyfill 1 https //liketk it/4t9xr
